page.description: The Xbasic_Stack_Dump() function returns a stack dump. - optional format L=line,S=scriptname,N=line number,D=depth,W=With depth.
page.syntax: Stack_Info as C = XBASIC_STACK_DUMP([C Xbasic_stack_dump[,C find_var_name[,C thread_name]]])
page.example: dim stack as C dim current_function as C stack = xbasic_stack_dump() current_function = word(stack,1,crlf() ) ? current_function = ui_dlg_event("@=a5_script_editor_internal",event)
